snippet: Gideon Irving, a singer-songwriter, performs his one-man shows in people's homes and apartments, and often ends up sleeping where he has just performed.
abstract: Gideon Irving, a singer-songwriter, performs his one-man shows in people's homes and apartments, and often ends up sleeping where he has just performed.

headline.main: A Roving Troubadour, With an Eye on Your Couch
headline.print_headline: A Roving Troubadour, Seeking a Sleepover
